title: Mount Gambier Boutique Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Cocktails
description:
Embrace a symphony of historic elegance and unrivalled hospitality at South Australia's Delgattie Estate, a boutique, adults-only hotel. Gracing the Mount Gambier landscape since 1902, this carefully restored grand country manor features just three luxuriously appointed suites, each offering exclusivity and intimacy. Reignite romance with a celebratory toast at the onsite Spehr Billiard Lounge & Balcony or book a table at the nearby Commodore on the Park restaurant for divine cuisine and some of the region's best wines.

Nestled in the heart of the Limestone Coast, Mount Gambier hides surprises around every corner. From heritage buildings, boutique shops and cosy restaurants to geological wonders, there's plenty to explore here. Discover the Umpherston Sinkhole, an underground Garden of Eden, and don't miss a visit to the sapphire waters of the Blue Lake.

title: Boutique Adults-Only Country Manor Escape in the Heart of Mount Gambier with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Bottle of Wine
description:
Experience a new era of refined living and embrace the grandeur of this heritage adults-only property nestled in the heart of South Australia's Mount Gambier. Built in 1902 and thoughtfully restored as a boutique hotel, this grand country manor is ensconced amid manicured gardens and boasts only three luxuriously appointed suites, perfect for an idyllic country escape.

Each of the individually designed suites opens up a world of its own, complete with stylish ensuites, a plush sitting area and garden access, offering exclusivity and romance.

When you're ready to mingle, head to the Spehr Billiard Lounge & Balcony to try your hand at a game of pool on the handcrafted billiard table. Indulge in some of Limestone Coast's finest regional produce at the adjacent restaurant, The Commodore, and sip on some of the region's finest wines while enjoying modern Australian dishes.

title: Mount Gambier Escape near Limestone Coast with Daily Breakfast
description:
Find yourself surrounded by gourmet indulgence at South Australia's The Commodore, an elegant hotel offering country hospitality and exceptional dining in Mount Gambier. Home to a mouthwatering restaurant alongside a collection of spacious rooms and suites, this beautifully-appointed property is the ideal base for foodies looking to explore the Mount Gambier region in style. Whether it's a lazy Sunday lunch or a special evening feast, you'll enjoy beautiful views across Frew Park while indulging in an extensive menu of seasonal dishes and chef specialities any time during the week.

Nestled in the heart of the Limestone Coast, Mount Gambier hides surprises around every corner. From heritage buildings, boutique shops, and cosy restaurants to geological wonders, there's plenty to explore here. Discover the Umpherston Sinkhole, an underground Garden of Eden, and don't miss a visit to the sapphire waters of the Blue Lake.
offer_address: Cnr Jubillee Highway and Penola Road Mount Gambier SA 5290 Australia

title: Charming Mt. Gambier Retreat near Blue Lake with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description: Explore the beauty of the Limestone Coast from The Henty, a serene retreat surrounded by Mt. Gambier’s top attractions and spectacular wine destinations. Indulge in delicious Mediterranean classics with a touch of contemporary Australian cuisine at the newly opened noky restaurant, or sample the outstanding curation of South Australian wines and spirits at your fingertips at the acclaimed wineries just a short drive away. Wander to the iconic Blue Lake, only a five-minute drive away, or stroll around the surrounding area to find the verdant Cave Gardens, along with historic monuments and war museums.
offer_address: 96 Jubilee Highway East, Mount Gambier SA 5290 Australia

title: Mount Gambier Escape Near Limestone Coast with Award-Winning Restaurant & Daily Breakfast
description:
Find yourself surrounded by gourmet indulgence at South Australia's The Commodore, an elegant hotel offering country hospitality and exceptional dining in Mount Gambier. This charming accommodation has a collection of studios and suites all moments from the town centre. Book a table at the hotel's star attraction The Commodore Restaurant - and indulge in divine cuisine and some of the region's best wines. Whether it's a lazy Sunday lunch or a special evening feast, you'll enjoy beautiful views across Frew Park while devouring the gastronomic delights of Mount Gambier.

Nestled in the heart of the Limestone Coast, Mount Gambier hides surprises around every corner. From heritage buildings, boutique shops, and cosy restaurants to geological wonders, there's plenty to explore here. Discover the Umpherston Sinkhole, an underground Garden of Eden, and don't miss a visit to the sapphire waters of the Blue Lake.
offer_address: Cnr Jubillee Highway and Penola Road Mount Gambier SA 5290 Australia

title: Grand Opening: Boutique Mount Gambier Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Enter a world of boutique luxury and history with an elegant stay at the newly opened Delgattie Estate, a heritage property nestled in the heart of South Australia’s finest regional city, Mount Gambier. Established in 1902 and carefully restored as a boutique hotel, this grand country manor offers only three luxuriously appointed suites, creating the perfect backdrop for a romantic escape in country SA.

Your lavish escape includes your choice of daily continental breakfast hamper delivered to your suite or A$50 daily breakfast credit per room to spend at Commodore on the Park restaurant, an exquisite cheese platter for two and a bottle of Delgattie Estate Private Label Sparkling Pinot Noir on arrival.

title: Boutique Mount Gambier Escape
description: Enter a world of boutique luxury and history with an elegant stay at the adults-only Delgattie Estate, a heritage property nestled in the heart of South Australia’s Mount Gambier. Established in 1902 and carefully restored as a boutique hotel, this grand country manor offers only luxuriously appointed suites, creating the perfect backdrop for a romantic escape in country SA. When you're ready to mingle, head to the Spher Billiard Lounge & Balcony to sip a drink and play a round of billiards on the Melbourne-crafted Alcock Barrel Leg billiard table - part of the property since the 1920s - or take a stroll through the manicured gardens.

title: Boutique Adults-Only Country Manor in the Heart of Mount Gambier
description:
Enter a world of boutique luxury and history with an elegant stay at the adults-only Delgattie Estate, a heritage property nestled in the heart of South Australia’s Mount Gambier. Established in 1902 and carefully restored as a boutique hotel, this grand country manor has just three luxuriously appointed suites in a perfect position for a romantic escape in the country.

Surrounded by lush gardens, each of the individually designed suites has its own stylish ensuite, sitting area and private access, offering exclusivity and romance. When you're ready to mingle, head to the onsite Spehr Billiard Lounge & Balcony for a drink or try your hand at a game of pool on the handcrafted billiard table. Then, book a table at Bankside Dining Room, where a bespoke menu showcases some of the Limestone Coast’s finest regional produce, or try the adjacent restaurant, The Commodore restaurant, for divine cuisine and some of the region's best wines.
